windows-mcp.description: Provides access to Windows system capabilities, including desktop automation, window management, and clipboard operations, simulating user interactions.

android-mcp.description: Provides access to Android system capabilities, including app automation, window management, and clipboard operations, simulating user interactions.

calculator-mcp.description: Performs mathematical calculations and expression evaluation to assist with quantitative tasks.

wikipedia-mcp.description: Accesses the vast knowledge base of Wikipedia to search for articles, retrieve summaries, and verify facts.

tavily-mcp.description: Utilizes the Tavily search API to perform high-quality, AI-optimized web searches for real-time information and research.

exa-mcp.description: Leverages the Exa (formerly Metaphor) semantic search engine to find high-quality, relevant web content based on meaning and context.

huggingface-mcp.description: Provides access to Hugging Face's API for natural language processing tasks.
